ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Pharaoh sent marshals into the cities:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then the Pharaoh sent announcers to the cities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then Pharaoh sent heralds to the cities (to mobilise troops)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We sent a revelation to Moses telling him to leave with our servants during the night; they would be pursued (by the Pharaoh).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So Firaun sent gatherers into the cities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then Fir`awn sent callers to (all) the cities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So Firon sent heralds into the cities;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities musterers:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then Pharaoh sent into the cities summoners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And Pharaoh sent forth heralds to all the cities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then Fir'awn sent unto the cities callers:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then Pharaoh sent heralds to the cities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then Pharaoh sent heralds to (all) the Cities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then Fir'aun (Pharaoh) sent callers to (all) the cities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then Pharaoh sent gatherers to the cities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Pharaoh sent heralds to the cities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:53] Then Pharaoh, having been informed of their night departure, sent to the cities — it is said that he ruled a thousand cities and twelve thousand villages — musterers, to assemble the army, saying:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then Pharaoh sent into the cities summoners) he summoned his police force,
